sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input class="input" type="text" :value="modelValue" @input="updateInput">
</template>

<script>



export default {
    name: 'MyInput',
    props: {
    },
    methods: {
        updateInput(event) {
            this.$emit('update:modelValue', event.target.value)
        }
    }

}

</script>

<style scoped>
.input {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    width: 90%;
}

</style>
